name: Login Test Data
description: Test data for positive and negative login scenarios.

testCases.testCaseDescription: Verify login succeeds with valid credentials.
Verify login fails with invalid username

expectedResult.result: User should not be logged in. An appropriate error message should appear.

expectedResult.result: User should not be logged in. An appropriate error message should appear.

expectedResult.result: User should not be logged in. An appropriate error message should appear.

expectedResult.result: User should not be logged in. An appropriate error message should appear.

testCases.testCaseDescription: Verify login fails with missing username and password

expectedResult.result: User should not be logged in. An appropriate error message should appear.
